import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import LineIcon from 'react-lineicons' import ProgressiveImage from 'react-progressive-image' import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import ToggleSwitch from './toggleSwitch'; import ReactSwitch from 'react-switch'; function Header() { const [information, setInformation] = useState('') const [navigationToggler, setNavigationToggler] = useState(false) const [checked, setChecked] = useState(false); const [lightMode, setLightMode] = useState(false) lightMode ? document.body.classList.add('light') : document.body.classList.remove('light') const handleNavigationToggler = () => { setNavigationToggler(!navigationToggler) } const handleMode = () => { if (!lightMode) { setLightMode(true) setChecked(true) document.body.classList.add('light') } else { setLightMode(false) setChecked(false) document.body.classList.remove('light') } } useEffect(() => { axios.get('/api/information').then((response) => { setInformation(response.data) }) }, []) return (
